titles.title: To extend the duty reduction on certain unwrought lead for a period of two years.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

bill.summary: 9/28/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1995, the duty reduction on certain unwrought lead.
